name: regex_automata::dfa::special::{impl#0}::remap
doc: /// Remaps all of the special state identifiers using the function given.
code: pub(crate) fn remap(&self, map: impl Fn(StateID) -> StateID) -> Special {

cond_chains.ret:
Special {
            max: map(self.max),
            quit_id: map(self.quit_id),
            min_match: map(self.min_match),
            max_match: map(self.max_match),
            min_accel: map(self.min_accel),
            max_accel: map(self.max_accel),
            min_start: map(self.min_start),
            max_start: map(self.max_start),
        }
